name: Rocketier
description:
In Rocketier, take a shot at being an awful pilot. With the constant threat of bashing into the wall looming overhead, and a constantly dwindling fuel supply, try your best to manage speed and control in this hectic rocket platformer. 

Each thruster is bound to a button, making it sometimes hard to remember which way is up, or even how to stop, so good luck and mind those walls. How hard could it be? It's not rocket science, just rocket flying!
